DialogueOption.Text: I learnt something cool about ghost matter, Arkose!
Hey, Arkose. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?

Dialogue.Page: W-wow.. Are you okay, astronaut?
How in the world did you do that?
Woah.. The ghost matter really goes away sometimes!
Huh? ..Oh! Are you asking about ghost matter, astronaut?
And here I was, thinking Gabbro and I were the only ones who knew about it, heehee!
But yeah! That's why I'm throwing rocks at the patch here in the village all day, astronaut.. <Pause=1> I’m trying to find out why ghost matter goes away completely sometimes!

DialogueOption.Text: The ghost matter.. goes away sometimes?

Dialogue.Page: Yeah, I know, right?! It's weird!
And I don't mean just evaporating slowly like it does bit by bit... I mean all at once!
You know how there’s a green glowy trail when you throw something into a patch of ghost matter?
When I throw rocks into this patch of ghost matter, sometimes, it doesn’t leave a trail at all.
I dunno what causes it! It doesn’t happen every time, even when I throw harder, or use different kinds of rocks.
I asked Gabbro about it last time they came back from Giant's Deep, and yeah, they said ghost matter just goes away sometimes!
They didn't seem to know much more than that, though.
It’s dangerous to get too close to the ghost matter, so I thought I'd just keep throwing rocks to see if I could figure it out on my own.

DialogueOption.Text: Maybe I'll go ask Gabbro what they know about that, then.

Dialogue.Page: Oh! If you find out anything cool about ghost matter, promise you'll come back and tell me too, astronaut! Pleeease?
I wanna know everything about ghost matter, so I'll be totally ready when I become an astronaut like you someday!
Something cool? Tell me, tell me!

DialogueOption.Text: Ghost matter killed the Nomaaiii shouldn't be telling you this, never mind.
Ghost matter becomes safe as long as it's submerged underwater.
Uhh.. Nevermind. I'll tell you about it when I get back from space!

Dialogue.Page: Wait, huh..? Did the Nomai.. get hurt because of ghost matter..?

DialogueOption.Text: Nononono, they just.. left because there was ghost matter all over the star system and it was too dangerous to stay around!

Dialogue.Page: Woah.. Is that true?
The Nomai must have been really, really smart to figure that out and leave the star system! I hope they're okay, wherever they are.
But, woah... So there was ghost matter everywhere, covering the WHOLE star system? That sounds.. scary.... <Pause=1> But really awesome!
Where did all that ghost matter go then, astronaut?
I mean, I know ghost matter evaporates... But that takes a suuuuper long time, right?
If they started going away at the same time, why's this patch so much slower? Is it just super bad at evaporating?
Heehee, ghost matter's so mysterious.. That's why I love it! Thanks for telling me, astronaut!
Woah.. <Pause=1> Is that what's making the ghost matter here disappear?
But.. There's not much water around here.
The geyser isn't spraying enough, and it hasn't rained at all lately.. I don't think that's what causing the ghost matter here to disappear..
But um, that's still really cool, astronaut!
I'm gonna ask Slate to build me a suit of water so I can do snow angels in the ghost matter later!
Huh?! Really?!
Ohh, so that's why the ghost matter goes away sometimes!
It must be the Attlerock's gravity pulling this patch here up when it's coming over the village!
I know that part, 'cos of the exhibit in the museum with the rolling balls!
I was so focused I never even noticed the Attlerock coming over the village every time it disappeared..
Thanks a bunch for telling me, astronaut! Phew, now I can finally rest my arm...
Aw.. Okay..
Hey, astronaut... Since ghost matter obeys gravity...
If somebody, um... borrowed.. the gravity crystal from the museum and pointed it near the ghost matter... Could I order the ghost matter to go anywhere I wanted?
Oooh, I can't wait! I'm gonna be able to shoot ghost matter at any mean bugs that fly at me from now on... Mwahahaha...

DialogueOption.Text: I learnt something cool about ghost matter, Arkose!
Hey, Arkose. Have you.. heard anything about stuff that disappears sometimes?
